title: Redesign Dashboard UI with more stylish visual theme

requirements.summary: Update Dashboard page visual design to apply a more stylish, modern aesthetic appropriate for a tax consulting firm, including enhanced spacing, typography hierarchy, color accents, card shadows/borders, and visual polish while maintaining all existing functional components
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard layout uses enhanced spacing and visual hierarchy to create a more polished, professional appearance
Metrics cards, revenue tables, and task breakdown sections include refined styling with appropriate shadows, borders, or accent colors
Typography is enhanced with clear size/weight hierarchy for headings, labels, and data values
The visual theme remains consistent with the existing app color palette (warm neutrals, sage green primary, charcoal tones)
All existing Dashboard functionality (drill-down navigation, data aggregations, clickable rows) continues to work without regression
The design maintains responsive behavior on mobile and tablet viewports

file_operations.description: Enhance the visual design of DashboardPage with refined styling for a more professional, modern aesthetic. Apply improved spacing with gap utilities and padding adjustments. Enhance metrics cards with subtle shadows (shadow-sm), borders (border border-border), and refined background colors. Add clear typography hierarchy using font-semibold/font-bold for headings, increased text sizes for key metrics (text-3xl/text-4xl), and muted colors for labels. Apply card shadows and borders to revenue aggregation tables and task breakdown sections. Use accent colors from the existing palette (sage green primary, warm neutrals) for visual highlights. Ensure all existing functionality (drill-down navigation via handleNavigation callbacks, data aggregations, clickable table rows) remains intact. Maintain responsive grid layouts and mobile behavior.

Review and potentially refine global CSS custom properties to ensure the warm neutrals, sage green primary, and charcoal tones are consistently applied across light and dark modes. Verify that border, muted, and accent color variables support the enhanced Dashboard styling. Add any missing utility classes for professional spacing or typography hierarchy if needed.
